2025-12-22 23:37:28.319 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:37:32.710 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"

        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'

    END

    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"

    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"

Executing controller action with signature System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1[Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ActionResult`1[System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[Api.Models.DTOs.ProjectListItem]]] GetProjects(Int32, Int32, System.String, System.Threading.CancellationToken) on controller Api.Controllers.ProjectsController (api).
2025-12-22 23:37:35.902 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:37:39.971 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:38:10.048 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:38:11.098 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:38:13.158 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:38:34.094 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:38:35.187 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:38:41.330 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:40:31.172 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:40:32.223 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:40:36.667 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:40:42.787 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:40:44.858 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:40:59.903 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:41:01.000 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:41:03.080 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:41:06.463 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:41:14.572 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:41:51.872 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:41:54.980 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:42:30.156 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:42:32.889 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:42:35.515 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:42:36.606 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:42:38.686 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"

Executing controller action with signature System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1[Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ActionResult`1[System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[Api.Models.DTOs.ProjectListItem]]] GetProjects(Int32, Int32, System.String, System.Threading.CancellationToken) on controller Api.Controllers.ProjectsController (api).
2025-12-22 23:42:42.765 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:43:15.957 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:43:51.144 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:43:57.241 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:44:30.405 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:45:04.529 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"

Executing controller action with signature System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1[Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ActionResult`1[System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[Api.Models.DTOs.ProjectListItem]]] GetProjects(Int32, Int32, System.String, System.Threading.CancellationToken) on controller Api.Controllers.ProjectsController (api).
2025-12-22 23:45:07.659 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:47:17.404 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
